AAU.caption: Encryption Key
AAU.doc: Receiver's armored public key to encrypt the message.
AAU.name: encryptionkey

AAV.caption: Signing Key
AAV.doc: Sender's armored and symmetric passphrase encrypted private key to sign the message.
AAV.name: signingkey

AAW.caption: Passphrase
AAW.doc: Sender's symmetric passphrase to decrypt the private key.
AAW.name: passphrase

AAX.caption: Signing Date
AAX.doc: Use the supplied date as the encryption date, instead of current date.
AAX.name: date

AAp.caption: File Name
AAp.doc: Sender's name of original message file to send to receiver.
AAp.name: filename

ACE.caption: Message Base64
ACE.doc: Input and output message is URL safe Base64 encoded raw bytes. Otherwise input is clear plain text and output is armored text (default).
ACE.name: base64

ACn.caption: Encrypt a message with a public key.
ACn.name: hint
